entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for April 23, 2024

summary.caption: Seconds before his ax fell, Farmer Dale suddenly noticed the chicken’s tattoo—the tattoo that marked them both as brothers of an ancient Tibetan order sworn to loyalty and mutual aid.

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for April 23, 2024

summary.caption: “And here he is—but when I started, I bet he was at least this tall.”
